thread.title: Banner for Alexis Sanchez's dogs makes debut at Arsenal vs. Burnley
thread.title_full: Banner for Alexis Sanchez's dogs makes debut at Arsenal vs. Burnley

author: Chris Wright
title: Banner for Alexis Sanchez's dogs makes debut at Arsenal vs. Burnley
text:
Banner for Alexis Sanchez's dogs makes debut at Arsenal vs. Burnley Alexis Sanchez and his dogs take pride of place at the Emirates. 
With the future of Alexis Sanchez at Arsenal currently in doubt, a group of forthright Gunners fans have been taking steps to persuade the Chile forward to prolong his stay at the Emirates. 
In a bid to make Sanchez feel more at home than ever, fan group REDaction put plans in place to produce a banner tribute to the two most important things in the 28-year-old forward's world: his dogs, Atom and Humber. 
Last month, fans brainstormed ideas on how the banner might look , and the winning design has taken pride of place at the Emirates for the first time as Arsenal host Burnley. 
REDaction set a target of Â£500 to be raised to fund the banner, and it soon past that mark following a flood of donations from eager Gooners. 
Let's hope it makes Sanchez PAWS for thought over his future and the fans aren't BARKING up the wrong tree. Yep, those jokes were rough. 
Chris covers the funny side of the game for ESPN FC in the Toe Poke blog.
